text:
The file wasn't labeled 'INVESTIGATION'. It was labeled 'CONTAINMENT'.

You remember the briefing room. No windows. Air cycling too loud.

"The town is a loss," the Director said. He didn't look up from the photos of the burning trees.

"Your job isn't to save it. Your job is to make sure it stays dead."

You remember nodding.

You remember taking the lighter.

You remember thinking: *It's just a job.*

But the smell of gasoline... you never got that off your hands, did you?
